message: I'm being fair, but I'm also taking the lion's share.  You have 11 rounds to make a counter-offer if you think you can do better!
Let's be realistic, Alice. This accounts for the time pressure and gives us both a good deal.

Time is money, Alice. Literally. This offer is fair and avoids further losses for both of us.
